features: QUICK & EFFECTIVE COMBO KIT- This all-in-one kit includes everything you need to safely perform CPR in any situation. The kit includes an Adult and Infant CPR mask, 2 Valves, A pair of vinyl gloves, and 2 alcohol prep pads.
DESIGNED FOR RESCUER FIRST RESPONDER- An essential item for any First Responder, it is safe for use on Adults, children, and even Great for CPR training on mannequins.
HIGH QUALITY & EASY TO USE: Our CPR mask features a one-way filter valve and elastic, latex fee head strap to enable a secure fit and hands-free operation.

PORTABLE POUCH- The kit contents are all kept in a Red pouch that is easy to carry or keep in your bag. Hassle free and lightweight, it is made with a Velcro handle for easy attachment to a belt, backpack strap, or first aid kit.
ELIMINATE CROSS CONTAMINATION- The Disposable valves that come in this kit have 3M fibers to protect the CPR practitioner from cross contamination.
body.description: Ever Ready First Aid Adult and Infant CPR Mask Combo Kit Prevent cross contamination and increase the effectiveness of resuscitation with this mouth to mask CPR kit. Each kit comes with an adult sized and an infant sized mask. Air cushioned edges provide a comfortable, contoured edge around the victims face. Includes carrying case for easy storage in first aid kits, vehicles, bags, etc. Detachable one way valve. 3M filtrete fibers protect the CPR practitioner and eliminates cross contamination All contents are latex free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kit Contents: Adult Sized Mask Child Sized Mask One Way Valve Two Alcohol Prep Pads Pair of Nitrile Gloves Travel Case Ever Ready First Aid Adult and Infant CPR Mask Combo Kit Prevent cross contamination and increase the effectiveness of resuscitation with this mouth to mask CPR kit. Each kit comes with an adult sized and an infant sized mask. Air cushioned edges provide a comfortable, contoured edge around the victims face. Includes carrying case for easy storage in first aid kits, vehicles, bags, etc. Detachable one way valve. 3M filtrete fibers protect the CPR practitioner and eliminates cross contamination All contents are latex free.

Reliable Protection Eliminate blowback with the included one-way valve. Protect yourself from communicable diseases while performing CPR. The 3M filtrete fibers protect the CPR practitioner and eliminates cross contamination The Right Size For All Ages The CPR mask combo kit is effective on victims of all ages; infants, children, and adults. Convenient Soft Case The small compact case makes for a great addition to any first aid kit. It's small enough to easily store away in a quickly accessible compartment in any car, boat, or vehicle.

Handy Clip For Quick Access The durable clip allows you to hook the case onto belt loops, backpacks, or other first aid kits to always have this critical piece of equipment available at a moments notice. Alcohol Prep Pads Prevent infection and cross contamination with these alcohol prep pads. Contains 70% isopropyl alcohol and 30% water, the ideal mix for disinfection. Nitrile Gloves Each kit includes a pair of latex-free, nitrile gloves. Ideal for keeping rescuers safe from the risk of infection while performing CPR.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I take it with me to work everyday. It has good quality and fits well in my jacket pocket. Remember to always wash and sanitize your hands before handling the CPR masks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the buy to save a life
reviews.reviewText: I am beyond ecstatic to start CPR/AED training. These are amazing & will come in handy for home use. Super easy to use, my 6 year old likes practicing on her dolls & I love it! Comes with 2 kits (one adult & one infant mask is included in both, so 4 masks total) with gloves & alcohol wipes. Very much worth the buy to possibly save a life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have
reviews.reviewText: Bought two. A must have for just the need. I keep one in my backpack and in my golf bag. Never know when a friend will be in need of quick cpr. Awesome deal. Nice , small and compact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Essential Component to Emergency First Aid Kit
reviews.reviewText: As a former EMT and Combat Medic, I maintain comprehensive first aid kits in my automobiles and at home. Given the concerns over bodily-fluid transmitted diseases prevalent today, masks are advisable for performing CPR on unknown individuals. This kit has large and small-sized masks for adults and children. This kit is compact and appears a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I can't give it 5 stars for value until I use them, which I hope I don't have to so that's why I gave it 4 stars. Everything else seems to be 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This car mask is incredible
reviews.reviewText: This mask is good for the money storage is excellent and the profomance is good haven't use it in real life yet but training with it works perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Includes everything needed for CPR!
reviews.reviewText: I love how everything fits inside the pouch provided. Makes it easy to carry around!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well made, pediatric and adult in one bag for carrying. Perfect for our use of giving them to people who have completed the cpr courses.
